description: We are a registered E-Rate Services Provider and we leverage technology funding for schools/libraries and provide guidance on Eligible Services
Hassle-free, reliable connectivity with speeds up to 400 Mbps. We provide circuit redundancy options and 24x7 network monitoring
Custom service and support agreements with remote and onsite helpdesk support. We run quarterly Technology Status Reviews and provide technology planning and budgeting
